overview.en: ABEL allows people to maximize their social capital in the most efficient way. ABEL aspires to create a “non-discriminatory distribution of work” for all, where each ABEL participant is entitled to regular income from his or her own efforts, without the need to invest any capital.
overview.zh: ABEL通过构建 全新的生产关系，让人们以最有效的途径来最大化自己的社会资本。 ABEL 立志为所有人创造“无差别按劳分配”，让每个 ABEL 的参与者都能有权通过自己的 努力定期获得收入，而不需要投入任何资本
